body.name: Perlegear Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26-55 inch Flat or Curved TVs, Wall Mount TV Bracket with Articulating Arm, Swivel, Tilt, Extension, Corner TV Wall Mount Max VESA 400x400mm up to 60 lbs PGMFK3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 56 mins
features: TV WAll Mount Compatibility: This tv mount fits most 26”-55” TVs with VESA patterns 75x75 to 400x400mm and weigh up to 60 lbs. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA mounting pattern of your TV before purchase wall mount tv brackets. Compatible with Samsung, Sony, Panasonic, Toshiba, Sharp, LG, Philips, JVC, and more other TV brands.

Enjoy the Best View : The full motion tv mount features +90°/-90° swivel, +5°/-15° tilt, level the TV +/-3° after installation. Easily adjust the swivel tv wall mount to minimize screen glare for more comfort.

Perfect for Corners & Space Saving: The single-stud design makes this tv mount the ideal solution for mounting your TV near a corner. The corner tv wall mount can extend out 18.9” from the wall and retract back to 2.0” for a low-profile look. It's perfect for smaller living rooms, kitchens, or rooms with non-standard wall stud spacing.

Solid Steel Heavy Duty Construction: Crafted from sturdy cold-rolled steel, this tv mount 50 in has high standards. The 55 inch tv wall mount has stronger articulating arm and wider wall plate ensure that your TV will stay securely in place on the wall.

Easy to Install: Mounting the mount for TV is as easy as 1-2-3. Step-by-step instructions and mounting hardware are included for hassle-free installation. Post-installation leveling allows you to fine-tune your TV’s position by +/-3° after mounting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perlegear PGMFK3 full motion TV wall mount 55 inch provides ultimate flexibility by allowing you to swivel, tilt, and extend your TV. The flexible designed ensures the perfect angle for viewing. The single-stud wall plate makes this TV wall mount an ideal solution for corners or recessed spaces.

Thanks to the wide range of VESA pattern compatibility, the 55 inch TV wall mount is suitable for most 26”-55” TVs and monitors. The TV wall mount 50 inch is perfect for mounting in the bedroom, kitchen, exercise room, study, and more.

The TV mount fits most 26”-55” TVs up to 60 lbs with VESA patterns 75x75 to 400x400mm. The TV mount can be installed on single wood stud, concrete, or brick walls. Do not mount on drywall alone. Locate the ports on the back of your TV to make sure the brackets will not block connections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and does the job
reviews.reviewText: It was installed on the wall easily and quickly, and is sturdy enough to hold our tv in place - even when readjusted to a different angle. Good price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. This product fit our 55inch tv super easily. Hold up alot of weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my master bedroom and it has been great. The instructions were very user friendly and it was easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and good quality
reviews.reviewText: Great mount with all the hardware included. Not fancy plastic covers, very basic but sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hang in There
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a bracket to hold larger flat screens. Easy to install. Is very adjustable (does not 360) yet very strong. The 3 point wall mount is very secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have a 55 inch tv on mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really secure, able to expand very far, and allows for easy adjustments to the viewing angle. Definitely will buy again in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, quality product!
reviews.reviewText: Works as good as one would hope. It's perfect!Very sturdy hold for my 48 incher. It slants, swivels, sways and I like it a lot
